title.rendered: “Inside IDF’s Northern Border Defense: Unveiling Secret Attacks and Weaponry Escapes in Lebanon and Syria”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Attached are the materials presented in the update by the IDF spokesperson, Brigadier General Daniel Hageri, on the defense and attack efforts on the northern border.

Attached are documentations from IDF attacks in Lebanese territory:
https://bit.ly/3HNTLuB
https://bit.ly/3SrAkwl

Attached is documentation of readiness and activity of the forces on the northern border:
https://bit.ly/3HMQonu

Attached is an infographic of the route of weaponry escape to Lebanon through Iran and Syria:
https://bit.ly/42thcTC

Attached is documentation of attacks in Syria and Lebanon that have not yet been revealed:

Attack on the “Golan file” unit – a Hezbollah branch in Syria
https://bit.ly/3SkKSgS

Attack on terrorists operating to launch an unmanned aerial vehicle
https://bit.ly/3uug8lz

Attack on a storage site for ground-to-air missiles in Lebanon
https://bit.ly/42sCzEd
